mutants.code:
def get_leaderboard_page(queryset, offset, LEADERBOARD_MAX_PER_PAGE):
    start_index = offset
    end_index = offset - LEADERBOARD_MAX_PER_PAGE
    return queryset[start_index:end_index]

def get_leaderboard_page(queryset, offset, LEADERBOARD_MAX_PER_PAGE):
    start_index = offset
    end_index = offset * LEADERBOARD_MAX_PER_PAGE
    return queryset[start_index:end_index]
